edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.FinalProject

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.FinalProject.Game

  • public class Game
extends Object
    (@link Game) is the class that contains the entire program, where we combine our work to create our game as intended. This class only contains two methods: main and printMaze. (@link main) is the main method for the program, where our maze is created, and executes our procedures to create our game (@link printMaze) prints our maze.
    Author:
    Team Jedi
